channel.title: Comments on: Issue 048 Author Interview: Leanne Howard and “Seven Beacons Burning”
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: alexgrehyauthor
item.dc:creator: alexgrehyauthor
item.description: Thank you for sharing your thoughts - I really enjoyed this story - the ending was so unexpected when I'd grown to love the characters - so much detail and emotion in so few words.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for sharing your thoughts – I really enjoyed this story – the ending was so unexpected when I’d grown to love the characters – so much detail and emotion in so few words.
